To install ZXTune123 to dingux

1) Extract this archive content to local/apps/zxtune123 folder
2.1) In case of DMenu:
  Edit local/dmenu/themes/${ThemeName}/menu_media.cfg:

  include("/usr/local/apps/zxtune123/zxtune123.cfg")

  in any place inside 'Menu' section (NOT inside 'MenuItem'!!!)
2.2) In case of GMenu:
  Copy file 'zxtune123' to local/gmenu2x/sections/applications/

3) Edit zxtune.conf for best sound

Hotkeys (not configured yet):

Left/Right - seeking
Up/Down/Left shoulder/Right shoulder - change volume
Start/B - pause
Select - exit
Any other - search for the next chiptune
